snippet.title: Armageddon Riders PS3 trailer
snippet.description:
Armageddon Riders with fairly better visuals, and split-screen cooperative mode will soon be aveliable in Play Station Network.

Zombie smashing and chopping, jet racing, and demolition derby. 

  *  *  *

 Armageddon Riders  is a bloody car battle for fans of fast drive, with no rules and no brakes! You're driving a killing machine on the streets of a dead city. Your enemies are zombies and marauders. Go get them!
Outrageous speed, rivers of blood, brutal cars, equipped with instruments of destruction: spikes, saws and blades, and don't forget the boosters. Hundreds of hungry zombies roam the streets, jumping on cars and trying to get to the drivers.
